title: upload is finished, icon keeps displayed - oc 4.5.5
body:
other than stated here: https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/648 the same issue occurs under oc 4.5.5

i recently updated an oc-installation from 4.0 to 4.5.2 and now to 4.5.5.

expected behaviour:
when i upload a file (regardless of filesize), the progressbar ist displayed, walks to the end and then disappears. the turning icon in front for the newly added file should as well be hidden. changing the page should not result in a browser-alert when the upload has finished.

actual behaviour:
the turning icon still stays displayed. a javascript error is thrown: "uncaught syntaxerror: unexpected token [...] core.js:11" on leaving the page in chrome (e.g. by clicking on "files" again) a warning ist diplayed, asking to confirm leaving (not displayed in ff or opera).

internet explorer behaves even worse: after completing the upload, the page refreshes and shows a note on top: "token expired. please reload page.". the file is not uploaded and disappears upon refresh.

the file is completely uploaded in all other browsers.

mimetype detection seems to work fine, icons for different filetypes are correctly displayed.

configuration:
oc-version: 4.5.5
php version 5.3.10-2
json version 1.2.1
sqlite3 module version 0.7-dev
sqlite library 3.7.12.1
server seems to be running debian 3.2.0 (phpinfo says "linux delta 3.2.0-2-amd64")

affected software
mac osx/safari (version not known)
mac osx/firefox (version not known)
win7/chrome 24
win7/opera 12
win7/firefox 17
win7/ie 9

p.s.: for no obvious reason the browser-message about leaving the page is not displayed anymore. i did not change anything, it just doesn't appear. the js-error is still thrown.
